text: Seewoosagur Ramgoolam (September 18, 1900 â€“ December 15, 1985; often referred to as Chacha Ramgoolam) was a Mauritian politician, statesman and philanthropist. He was the country's first Chief Minister, Prime Minister of Mauritius, and Governor-General. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Mauritius
title: Seewoosagur Ramgoolam
